scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified as King David by the presence of a harp, is depicted wearing a crown and a blue cap. He is dressed in a red robe adorned with gold patterns and a white collar. His left hand points outwards, while his right hand holds a white cloth. A harp, a musical instrument associated with King David, is visible to his left. The background is a vibrant blue with scattered circular motifs. The scene is framed by an architectural element suggestive of a decorative archway.
